product_name: Patagonia Baby Synchilla Vest - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: The Patagonia Baby Synchilla Vest is made of soft polyester fleece and features a zip front with windflap. Warm, soft polyester double-faced fleece features mostly recycled content. Tapered, non-chafing, stand-up collar keeps your little dude warm and having fun. Drop-tail hem extends coverage and increases comfort. Hand-me-down ID label ensures his vest won't get lost in the crowd.
short_description: The Patagonia Baby Synchilla Vest is made of soft polyester fleece and features a zip front with windflap.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
